abstract: Joe Ratterman, BATS Global’s chief executive, recounted in an interview how much his company had prepared for its initial public offering — only to see months of work undone by an unforeseen technical mistake.
snippet: Joe Ratterman, BATS Global’s chief executive, recounted in an interview how much his company had prepared for its initial public offering — only to see months of work undone by an unforeseen technical mistake.
lead_paragraph: Friday morning did not go quite the way Joe Ratterman had expected.

headline.main: BATS Chief on Friday’s Troubles: ‘My Stomach Sank’

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
